body.text: Klaips CL, Hochstrasser ML, Langlois CR, Serio TR. 2014. Spatial quality control bypasses cell-based limitations on proteostasis to promote prion curing. eLife 3:e04288. doi: 10.7554/eLife.04288
In the published article, the second column in Figure 5—figure supplement 1B was incorrectly labelled as ‘Sis1GFP’. This should have been labelled ‘Ssa1GFP’.
The article has been corrected accordingly.
